name: Abdul-Wahhab Yousuf
personality: quiet and reserved, but fiercely loyal to his unit
story: Abdul-Wahhab Yousuf grew up in a small village in Iran. As a child, he loved playing with toy soldiers and dreamed of one day becoming a soldier himself. After finishing high school, he joined the Iranian military and served for several years before being recruited by OPFOR. He excelled in his training and was quickly promoted to his current rank. Abdul-Wahhab is dedicated to his job and takes great pride in protecting his comrades and completing his missions successfully.
